meanings.definition: Charm or enchant (someone), sometimes in a deceptive way.
meanings.sent1: The magician beguiles the audience with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent2: She beguiles her friends with her sweet smile.
meanings.sent3: The sly fox beguiles the other animals with his clever disguises.
meanings.sent4: The con artist beguiles unsuspecting victims with promises of easy money.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting melody beguiles all who hear it.

meanings.sent1: The scammer beguiles people into giving him their personal information.
meanings.sent2: He beguiles his opponents with false moves in chess.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child beguiles his siblings with pranks.
meanings.sent4: The cunning spy beguiles the enemy with his elaborate disguises.
meanings.sent5: The illusionist beguiles the audience with his mind-bending tricks.

meanings.sent1: She beguiles the hours by reading her favorite book.
meanings.sent2: They beguile the evening with board games and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The old man beguiles his loneliness by tending to his garden.
meanings.sent4: The travelers beguile the long journey with stories and songs.
meanings.sent5: The children beguile the rainy day with indoor activities.
